description: a light weight and powerful system explorer.
notes:
The newest version is 7.1.0.5359 but we can only download 7.0.0 from the official site.
So we put the installer in local path.
The URL defined in bucket file must be absolute except the drive letter and include installer file name.
The default path is '\Scoop\local_installer', assume running scoop in the same drive.
Ensure it is correct before calling scoop.

Usage: scoop install {path_to_bucket\}lc_systemexplorer.json
